name: Gravity Ball (itch) (whiteshampoo)
description:
This is/was my first attempt at making a game with Godot.

In HTML5-Mode, the sound is very laggy, and i can't find the reason :/
So please use the Desktop-Version if possible!

Not testet under Linux and MacOS.
It SHOULD be mobile-friendly, but it's pretty buggy.

If someone is interessted, i can share the project-folder. (It's a mess!)

Level 1-6 are more or less the Tutorial. Level 7 is the only "real" Level...

Controls:

Left/Right: Roll
Space: Jump
R: Reset Level
T: Next Music-Track
ESC: Menu

Although the project is dead, I would still be interested in your opinion.
